book.synopsis: When we were kids, Mom or Dad taught us how to tie our shoes and fold our clothes. Most of us have been left to our own devices ever since! Finishing Touches is STC

s neckwear. More than 20 different tying techniques are shown. AUTHOR BIO: SUSAN OLIVER, who learned to sew by watching her mother, designs and sews wedding gowns and couture dresses. She earned her B.A. in English Literature, Fine Arts, and Psychology from Stanford University and her M.A. in Art Therapy from New York University.

DAWN JACKSON-ROBINSON is a researcher at the New York Daily News, where she has worked for 20 years. She received her B.A. in Broadcast Journalism at Western Kentucky University and her M.A. in Creative Writing at the City College of New York.
